# Provincial (Drawback)
## Overview
**Provincial:** You have only one way of looking at things: the right way. You take a â€”2 penalty on [[Diplomacy (Skill)|Diplomacy]] checks and [[Sense Motive (Skill)|Sense Motive]] checks made against all creatures whose religion or alignment differs from your own.

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 65
